name: SnoC Adventure!!
description:
----------------------Controls:

Press Space On The Title Screen To Start.

Press Space On The File Select To Start.

Use Up And Down Keys On The File Select To Change Your Character.

Hold C + D To Enter Debug Mode, From There Holding C Will Move You 1 Pixel Per Step. Pressing X Will Change Your Object, And Pressing Z Will Place Your Object.

Peel-out Can Be Turned On And Off By Going To The Configuration Sprite

Up Then Press Z While Not Moving

Spin-dash Can Be Turned On And Off By Going To The Configuration Sprite

Down Then Press Z While Not Moving

Basic Controls:

Left Or Right: Move

Down While Running: Roll

Z: Jump

----------------------Credits:

engine by @gvbvdxx (on scratch)

sonic sprites by @megateam (on scratch)

sonic is owned by SEGA

CFY 98 on youtube for the  emerald coast remix song as the level "sand"

JemenJ on youtube for the sonic 2 death egg dance remix song as the level "ITZ EXPLOEDING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"
